meanings.definition: Characterized by bouncing or jolting movements.
meanings.sent1: The jouncy car ride made me feel like I was on a trampoline.
meanings.sent2: The jouncy ball bounced erratically around the room.
meanings.sent3: The jouncy puppy kept leaping around the yard, full of energy.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt jouncy with excitement as she waited for the results.
meanings.sent5: The jouncy motion of the boat on the waves was both thrilling and unsettling.

meanings.definition: Bouncing or jolting in a lively or energetic manner.
meanings.sent1: The jouncy music at the party got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent2: The jouncy children played happily in the park.
meanings.sent3: The jouncy squirrel darted from tree to tree, full of energy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was jouncy and infectious, spreading joy to all around.
meanings.sent5: The jouncy rhythm of the drums made the crowd feel alive and energized.
